Send customers a confirmation email to notify them that their helpdesk ticket has been received and is currently being reviewed by the helpdesk team. Automatically send an email to customers when a ticket reaches a specific stage in a helpdesk team by setting this template on that stage.

field.name: body_html

div.style: font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; color: #333;

field.div:
Dear ,
Thank you for contacting us. Your support ticket has been successfully created and our team has started reviewing your request.
Ticket Reference:
We aim to resolve your request within 24 hours. If we need any additional information, our team will contact you shortly.
You may reply to this email at any time to add more details to your request.
Best regards,
Team
